# [FEAT] Automated Ticket Classification

## Labels
`ai`, `automation`, `priority:medium`

## Description
Implement automated ticket classification using AI to reduce manual categorization effort.

## Requirements

### Classification Types
- Category/Type
- Priority level
- Product/Service area
- Issue type
- Complexity level
- Language

### Classification Process
- Analyze on ticket creation
- Re-classify on updates
- Confidence scoring
- Manual override option
- Bulk classification

### Training
- Learn from historical data
- Agent corrections feedback
- Continuous improvement
- Custom classification rules
- Exception handling

### Classification Rules
- Keyword-based rules
- Pattern matching
- ML-based classification
- Hybrid approach
- Fallback behavior

### Integration
- Pre-fill ticket fields
- Trigger automations
- Routing decisions
- SLA assignment
- Reporting categorization

### Monitoring
- Classification accuracy
- Agent override rates
- Confidence distributions
- Category trends
- Error analysis

## Zendesk Reference
AI-driven insights through Intelligent Triage automatically classify issues and suggest resolutions.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Auto-classification works
- [ ] Confidence scores available
- [ ] Manual override possible
- [ ] Learning from corrections
- [ ] Accuracy reporting
